Block * block [10][25]

Detailed Description

levelFive.cpp

Creates the design for the fifth level. Uses the polymorphism feature of the block.cpp class and randomly generates blocks of different colors and places them in a pre-defined layout. Also places the mothership in the layout as part of the boss battle

Author: Natraj Subramanian

Definition at line 18 of file levelFive.h.
